This is an array adapter for the admin view for browsing events.

BrowseEventsFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all events in the application.

This is an array adapter for the admin view for browsing facilities.

ElapsedTimeIdlingResource
 
EventArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying EventModel items in a ListView.
EventArrayAdapter.EventArrayAdapterListener
Interface to listen for waitlist changes in events.
EventController
Controller class for managing an EventModel instance.
EventFragment
Fragment for displaying and editing details of an event.
EventModel
EventModel represents an event in the application with attributes such as title, location, cost, description, number of spots, event type, and poster image.
EventModel.FacilityCallback
Callback interface for handling FacilityModel retrieval asynchronously.
EventsController
Controller class for managing a collection of events represented by the EventsModel.
EventsModel
Model class for managing a collection of events.
EventsModel.EventFetchCallback
Callback interface for fetching event documents.
EventsModel.MyEventsCallback
Callback interface for retrieving the current user's events.
EventView
EventView is responsible for observing changes in the EventModel and updating the corresponding EventFragment with the latest event details.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilityController
FacilityController is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.
FacilityControllerTest
 
FacilityFragment
FacilityFragment class manages the facility details of the user in the application.
FacilityModel
A model class that stores information about a given Facility.
FacilityModelTest
 
FacilityView
FacilityView is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture.

OrganizerInterface
Interface for organizers to create, manage, and handle event-related operations.
QrCodeModel
QrCodeModel class provides methods to generate a QR code image and create a SHA-256 hash.
QrCodeModelTest
 
QrFragment
QrFragment is a fragment class that displays a QR code image.

UserModel is the data model representing a user in the application.
